title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 176: Featuring Bates Battaglia
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Bates Battaglia. Bates joins to talk about his career, his hate for Bruce Cassidy, his bar and a bunch more. The boys then move on to the Conference Finals series and are watching the Sharks vs Blues game live when the controversial goal happened. The fellas give their knee jerk reactions on the goal and break down the series and also look at the Bruins vs Hurricanes series. The boys also touch on the new coaching hire in Buffalo. Ryan is a huge fan of Ralph Krueger so he explains why.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
